source.query:
WITH line_item_details AS (
    SELECT
        a.id, 
        a.variant_id AS product_variant_id,
        COALESCE(SUM(siu.quantity_count), 0) AS quantity,
        a.price,
        a.created_at,
        a.replaced, -- Use the alias 'a' here
        COALESCE(a.updated_at, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AS updated_at,
        CASE 
            WHEN a.on_sale = false THEN a.price
            ELSE '0.0'
        END AS action_price,
        CASE 
            WHEN a.on_sale = true THEN a.price
            ELSE '0'
        END AS sale_price,
        b.product_id,
        CASE
            WHEN d.replace_product::varchar = 'true' THEN 'replace-with-similar-product' 
            WHEN d.replace_product::varchar = 'false' THEN 'cancel'
            ELSE NULL
        END AS replacement_pref,
        CASE 
            WHEN COALESCE(SUM(e.quantity), 0) < 5 THEN COALESCE(SUM(e.quantity), 0)
            ELSE 0
        END AS picked_quantity,
        0 AS picker_id,
        COALESCE(c.shipment_id, 0) AS order_shipment_id,
        1 AS category_id, -- default value = 1 (grocery id from category table)
        '' AS status,
        CASE 
            WHEN COALESCE(SUM(e.quantity), 0) < 5 THEN 0 -- If picked_quantity < 5
            ELSE COALESCE(SUM(e.quantity), 0) -- Assign picked_quantity as picked_weight
        END AS picked_weight -- New column
    FROM spree_line_items a 
    LEFT JOIN spree_variants b ON b.id = a.variant_id
    LEFT JOIN (
        SELECT DISTINCT ON (line_item_id) * 
        FROM spree_inventory_units
    ) c ON c.line_item_id = a.id
    LEFT JOIN (
        SELECT 
            line_item_id, 
            state, 
            COUNT(id) AS quantity_count
        FROM spree_inventory_units 
        WHERE state != 'canceled'
        GROUP BY line_item_id, state
    ) siu ON siu.line_item_id = a.id 
    LEFT JOIN spree_orders d ON d.id = c.order_id
    LEFT JOIN spree_picked_items e ON e.pickable_id = a.id
    GROUP BY
        a.id, 
        a.variant_id,
        a.price,
        a.created_at,
        a.updated_at,
        a.on_sale,
        b.product_id,
        d.replace_product,
        c.shipment_id,
        a.replaced -- Include a.replaced in the GROUP BY clause
)
SELECT 
    id, 
    product_variant_id, 
    quantity, 
    price, 
    created_at, 
    updated_at, 
    action_price, 
    sale_price, 
    product_id,
    replaced, -- Use 'replaced' from spree_line_items (alias a)
    replacement_pref, 
    picked_quantity, 
    picked_weight, -- Include picked_weight in the SELECT
    picker_id, 
    order_shipment_id, 
    category_id, 
    status
FROM line_item_details
LIMIT 100;
